cards: What's one habit of your partner that secretly melts you?
Describe your perfect date night in three words.
What song reminds you most of us?
Share the moment you knew they were special.
What's your partner's most adorable quirk?
Kiss your partner like it's your first date.
Share one thing you've never told them before.
What's your favorite memory together so far?
Whisper something sweet in their ear.
What made you first attracted to them?
Give your partner a 30-second massage.
Share your dream vacation together.
What's one thing you admire most about them?
Dance together for one full minute.
What's the silliest thing you've done together?
Tell them why you're grateful for them today.
Share your most embarrassing moment together.
Give three genuine compliments right now.
What's one goal you want to achieve together?
Show your partner your favorite photo of them.
